channel.title: Hammer on Universal
channel.description: Recent content in Hammer on Universal

item.title: E01555
item.description: Unused Eurotec hammer, rated for excavators from 4 till 9 ton, fitted with chisel tool.

item.title: E01556
item.description: Unused Eurotec hammer, rated for excavators from 4 till 9 ton, fitted with chisel tool.

item.title: K00388
item.description: DNB D 90lls, Rated for excavators from 18 till 30 ton, 1860 kgs operating weight, oil flow 120-160 L/min, 140 bar operating pressure, 350-500 blows/min impact frequency, 4400 Joules impact energy, 130mm tool diameter. Hammer is ex job site condition.

item.title: K00723
item.description: Miller Rock hammer Bracket to suit Caterpillar 345 or similar size excavator, pins 90/110mm, stick 505mm, CE marked.

item.title: K02300
item.description: Tighe top plate for rock hammer, suitable for excavators from 45 - 50 Ton.

item.title: K03134
item.description: NPK H30X Rockhammer, rated for excavators from 50-75 ton, 4.808 Kgs operating weight, oil flow 250-303 L/min, 183 bar operating pressure, 300-350 blows/min impact frequency, 175mm tool diameter, including chisel. Hydraulic hoses and adapter plate can be supplied at extra cost. Hammer is in ex-job site condition.

item.title: K03136
item.description: Unused Mustang MB1500 hammer, working pressure 150 bar, oil flow 100-145 Ltr/min, relief pressure 250 bar, operating weight 1500 Kgs, conical chisel, 130mm tool diameter, 400-900 blows/min impact frequency, CE marked. Rated for excavators from 18 till 26 ton.

item.title: K03427
item.description: NPK E220 Rockhammer, rated for excavators from 30-45 ton, 3.085 Kgs operating weight, oil flow 200-250 L/min, 162 bar operating pressure, 350-430 blows/min impact frequency, 156mm tool diameter, including chisel. Hydraulic hoses and adapter plate can be supplied at extra cost. Hammer is in good condition, test movie available on request.

item.title: K03729
item.description: New and unused Boart Longyear PLA201.1 pneumatic jack hammer. 5 units immediately available from stock!

item.title: K03935
item.description: New flat chisel for rock breaker, length 1050mm, diameter 115mm, single retaining area, suitable for Rammer S54, Caterpillar H115, JCB HM560
